TopicTitle: Stock Reusable Boosters are way too much fun!

Articles.Content:
Decided to make some stock reusable boosters. The result was actually pretty cool, ended up with 3 different versions. Check it out!

 

Edited February 6, 2016 by MoonMan22
Tags

That was an extremely sweet landing. I do a few reusables myself, but with a girder-argumented landing gear and parachutes for stability, as I only recently unlocked Vectors and did not know they were so short.

52 minutes ago, Freshmeat said:

That was an extremely sweet landing. I do a few reusables myself, but with a girder-argumented landing gear and parachutes for stability, as I only recently unlocked Vectors and did not know they were so short.

Thank you, it does add a bit more fun to the game. It's just tricky putting the 2nd stage on the right trajectory to ensure that you have enough time to land the booster then switch back to it and perform the orbital insertion. I have some crew versions too and want to develop both a fully reusable rocket (landing second stage too) and a reusable Mars transfer system.
